message.content: {"id": "49299", "title": "Bug 49299: Incorrect behavior with custom cookie name in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1", "description": "The information provided in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 regarding the effect of a custom cookie name on URL rewriting is incorrect.", "OB": "The Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 incorrectly states that a custom cookie name affects URL rewriting.", "EB": "Instead of using the custom cookie name as specified, the current implementation in the trunk uses the default 'jsessionid' for URL rewriting.", "SR": "To reproduce this issue, follow these steps: 1. Deploy the attached war file named 'cookiename.war'. 2. Access http://localhost:8080/cookiename/."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '49299', 'title': 'Bug 49299Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 says that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting', 'description': 'Bug 49299Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 says that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting ', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'Expected result: if that phrase in 7.1.1 is to be followed, I would expect the Reload link to behttp://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F ', 'SR': '"That is not true for the current trunk: the default "jsessionid" is used instead.I am attaching a war file that reproduces this issue.Steps to reproduce:1. Deploy it as cookiename.war2. Access http://localhost:8080/cookiename/3. '}
